listitem.para: a matrix of doubles, the outcome. x in [0,1]
a matrix of doubles , the number of observations. N belongs to the set {1,2,3,4,.......,2147483647}
a matrix of doubles, the probability density.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Computes the probability distribution function of the Kolmogorov-Smirnov distribution function.
Any scalar input argument is expanded to a matrix of doubles of the same size as the other input arguments.

refsection.title: Examples
